discourse_list.title: Videos from the Web3 UX Unconf

content.content: Update by moderators: These videos can now be found on youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5rc5OmS0BlqMbUfFrXpxag/videos  All the videos have been uploaded to: http://watch.livemedia.biz/register/thundertoken.aspx  They will be hosted there for a year I think.  Kyokan is also helping to upload the videos to youtube; I will post here again when it’s done. In the mean time, you can also download the raw files here: 9:30 -  Presentation 1: Tom Creighton - UX lessons from successful startups http://www.mediafire.com/file/mipd74z5gai6xtm/Presentation_1_Tom_Creighton.mp4 10:00 - Presentation 2: Dan Finlay - MetaMask’s new UI http://www.mediafire.com/file/esnd0bbmba5phsv/Presentation_2_Dan_Finlay.mp4 10:30 - Presentation 3: Daniel Ternyak - Tools and Strategies MyCrypto Has Developed While Revamping the Wallet Interface http://www.mediafire.com/file/gn3lglmmw9ed6r9/Presentation_3_Dan_Ternyak.mp4 11:00 - Presentation 4: Richard Burton - WalletConnect: Connect to Web-based Dapps From the Phone http://www.mediafire.com/file/oo2cjibijwnwnpg/Presentation_4_Richard_Burton.mp4 11:30 - Lunch 12:30 - Presentation 5: Alex Van de Sande - Universal Logins for Ethereum http://www.mediafire.com/file/0cdtbimsm9fk8hw/Presentation_5_Alex_Van_de_Sande.mp4 13:00 - Presentation 6: Philippe Castonguay + Panashe Mahachi – Smart Accounts http://www.mediafire.com/file/oa11rxa6a024w4x/Presentation_6_Philippe_Castonguay_and_Panashe_Mahachi.mp4 13:30 - Presentation 7: Viktor Radchenko - What I learned from Building Trust http://www.mediafire.com/file/95n4q9a65tuj4e0/Presentation_7_Viktor_Radchenko.mp4 14:00 - Presentation 8: Sid Coelho-Prabhu - Toshi1 http://www.mediafire.com/file/5tjpkgg6859f8tc/Presentation_8_Sid_Coelho-Prabhu.mp4 14:30 - Presentation 9: Andy Tudhope - Thoughts About UX at Status and What We Have Been Up To http://www.mediafire.com/file/xtmbjv5atxgxkdc/Presentation_9_Andy_Tudhope.mp4 15:00 - Presentation 10: Beltran Berrocal - Web3 Design Principles http://www.mediafire.com/file/8ubrlfjsl3zzt59/Presentation_10_Beltran_Berrocal.mp4 15:30 - Presentation 11: Lane Rettig - Towards an Open Data Marketplace http://www.mediafire.com/file/tvp2hve9xkj0k9i/Presentation_11_Lane_Rettig.mp4 16:00 - Presentation 12: Martin Holst Swende - The New Ethereum Signer http://www.mediafire.com/file/rwb8y91c41078ld/Presentation_12__Martin_Holst_Swende.mp4 16:30 - Presentation 13: Maciej Hirsz - Parity Signer http://www.mediafire.com/file/9nz71tdvvb1u6zj/Presentation_13_Maciej_Hirsz.mp4 17:00 - Presentation 14: C. Jordan Muir - Frame, a Cross-platform Ethereum Provider http://www.mediafire.com/file/ic13h1eegy1333k/Presentation_14_C_Jordan_Muir.mp4 17:30 - Dinner 18:30 - Presentation 15: Michael Sena - Privacy Preserving User Identity Systems for Ethereum dApps http://www.mediafire.com/file/yt8cvdevapifc5h/Presentation_15_Michael_Sena.mp4 19:00 - Presentation 16: Jeremy Welch - Casa/Multisig/Multilocation http://www.mediafire.com/file/dgl9mu5cb29v2fm/Presentation_16_Jeremy_Welch.mp4 19:30 - Presentation 17: Luis - Radspec: A Safe Alternative to Ethereum’s Natspec to Make Transactions Human-readable http://www.mediafire.com/file/vulk2pqksm4sejw/Presentation_17_Luis_-_Radspec.mp4 (updated by moderators to show links to the videos instead of the video embeds)
These video links don’t work for me. How’s the YouTube upload going?
Also not working for me in Chrome or in Safari. Neither does the page you linked. Youtube please
I got the download links from the video tags. works-for-me™ Here’s the list of them: https://gist.github.com/evertonfraga/245addbaa4f9b22197dc78bd45032554
Thanks for this. Can I also upload my talk to my channel?
Yeah definitely!  We don’t own the videos.  Feel free to do whatever you like with it!
Thanks to Stacey from Kyokan, the videos have been uploaded to Youtube! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5rc5OmS0BlqMbUfFrXpxag/videos
